hasDitaContent.@value: Torasemide is predicted to cause hypokalaemia (potentially increasing the risk of torsade de pointes) when given with lithium. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasDitaContent.@value: Torasemide increases the concentration of lithium. Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Torasemide   increases   the concentration of   lithium .  Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose .
